title: Christmas Cakes
description: Christmas would not be Christmas for the villagers in San Vitale without their precious Christmas cakes. It was a tradition. But this year, something dreadful happened--all the delicious cakes have disappeared! How Lucas the baker's son saves Christmas for the village of San Vitale and introduces a brand-new holiday tradition in the process is a joyous story that celebrates the true spirit of Christmas.
author: Francesca Bosca
